Jopi was a man who lived on the Sword Coast during the midâˆ’14 century DR.
He had an rather famous uncle who lived in Baldurs Gate, the mage known as Ragefast. When he was young Jopi would affectionately refer to his uncle as Grumpleskin, often provoking the casting of a non-harmful spell in response.
In the , Jopi made a trip along the Coast Way to visit his uncle at his home in the city. His journey took longer than expected due to the increased bandit activity that sprang up during the Iron crisis of that year. He made as stop over at the Friendly Arm inn to briefly avoid the perils of travel on the coast.
